Package javafx.stage

Provides the top-level container classes for JavaFX content.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectoryChooser
    Provides support for standard directory chooser dialogs.
    DirectoryChooserBuilder
    Builder class for javafx.stage.DirectoryChooser
    FileChooser
    Provides support for standard file dialogs.
    FileChooser.ExtensionFilter
    Defines an extension filter, used for filtering which files can be chosen in a FileDialog based on the file name extensions.
    FileChooserBuilder
    Builder class for javafx.stage.FileChooser
    Popup
    A Popup is a special window-like container for a scene graph.
    PopupBuilder<B extends PopupBuilder<B>>
    Builder class for javafx.stage.Popup
    PopupWindow
    PopupWindow is the parent for a variety of different types of popup based windows including Popup and Tooltip and ContextMenu.
    PopupWindowBuilder<B extends PopupWindowBuilder<B>>
    Builder class for javafx.stage.PopupWindow
    Screen
    Describes the characteristics of a graphics destination such as monitor.
    Stage
    The JavaFX Stage class is the top level JavaFX container.
    StageBuilder<B extends StageBuilder<B>>
    Builder class for javafx.stage.Stage
    Window
    A top level window within which a scene is hosted, and with which the user interacts.
    WindowBuilder<B extends WindowBuilder<B>>
    Builder class for javafx.stage.Window
    WindowEvent
    Event related to window showing/hiding actions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Modality
    This enum defines the possible modality types for a Stage.
    StageStyle
    This enum defines the possible styles for a Stage.

Package javafx.stage Description

Provides the top-level container classes for JavaFX content.
